trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZB004_05033_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The troubled craftsman is in need of a helping hand.
TEXT_KINGZB004_05033_TODO_00<tab>Search for the missing pouch at Panaqpelu Retreat.
TEXT_KINGZB004_05033_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the missing pouch to the troubled craftsman.

TEXT_KINGZB004_05033_CRAFTERPELUPELU05033_000_000<tab>Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, do you have a moment? Please, I need your help! I'm a craftsman come to discuss a new project with a client, but I seem to have lost my lucky charm along the way─my dear doll.

TEXT_KINGZB004_05033_CRAFTERPELUPELU05033_000_001<tab>I'm afraid how the meeting may turn out without it... The last time I saw it was at Panaqpelu Retreat. Maybe it fell out when I was gathering my things.

TEXT_KINGZB004_05033_CRAFTERPELUPELU05033_000_002<tab>I'm to meet with my client in just a moment, and it wouldn't do to be late. I realize this is sudden, but would you find my doll for me? I'll delay the meeting for as long as I can.
TEXT_KINGZB004_05033_CRAFTERPELUPELU05033_000_005<tab>It should be inside a small pouch somewhere within the premises of Panaqpelu Retreat. Please find it for me, won't you?
TEXT_KINGZB004_05033_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You locate a small pouch behind the shelf. Inside you find an adorable doll, a warm smile adorning its face. This appears to be the missing item.
TEXT_KINGZB004_05033_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>You open the lid and look inside the jar, but the doll is nowhere to be found within.
TEXT_KINGZB004_05033_CRAFTERPELUPELU05033_000_021<tab>Oh thank goodness, my precious doll! I won't let it out of my sight again!

TEXT_KINGZB004_05033_CRAFTERPELUPELU05033_000_022<tab>We Pelupelu became merchants after Gulool Ja Ja bestowed a great kindness upon our people, to help achieve his goal of fostering amity between clans. This doll's bright smile serves as a reminder to uphold that ideal─to spread happiness through trade.

TEXT_KINGZB004_05033_CRAFTERPELUPELU05033_000_023<tab>I've no doubt that you, being the kind-hearted individual that you are, will enjoy great fortune and happiness in your future business endeavors. I truly can't thank you enough for your help!
